meanings.definition: The quality or state of being imaginable.
meanings.sent1: The imaginableness of the story made it easy to picture in my mind.
meanings.sent2: Her vivid description added to the imaginableness of the scene.
meanings.sent3: The imaginableness of the unicorn in the story brought a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: The author's skillful use of words enhanced the imaginableness of the world she created.
meanings.sent5: The imaginableness of the adventure stayed with me long after I finished the book.

meanings.definition: The ability to be imagined or conceived.
meanings.sent1: The imaginableness of his plan surprised everyone with its creativity.
meanings.sent2: The endless possibilities of the future filled her with a sense of imaginableness.
meanings.sent3: The imaginableness of a flying pig captured the children's attention.
meanings.sent4: The imaginableness of a world without colors seemed impossible to grasp.
meanings.sent5: The imaginableness of the solution dawned on him like a bright light in the dark.
